DESCRIPTION Helpers

Source: vignettes/DESCRIPTION-Helpers.Rmd
DESCRIPTION-Helpers.Rmd
library(easyBakeOven)

Make DESCRIPTION

The DESCRIPTION can be printed back into the console to view or copy and pasting.

makeDescription(path = "~/GitHub/packages/easyBakeOven/", github_user = "meerapatelmd", repo = "easyBakeOven")
#> Package: easyBakeOven
#> 
#> Title: Helpers for Package Authoring
#> 
#> Version: 0.0.0.9000
#> 
#> Authors@R: person(given = "Meera",
#> family = "Patel, MD",
#> role = c("aut", "cre"),
#> email = "patelmeeray@gmail.com",
#> comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0002-3401-3948"))
#> 
#> Description: Return values in the console for copy and pasting while authoring packages.
#> 
#> License: `use_mit_license()`
#> 
#> Encoding: UTF-8
#> 
#> LazyData: true
#> 
#> Roxygen: list(markdown = TRUE)
#> 
#> RoxygenNote: 7.1.1
#> 
#> URL: https://meerapatelmd.github.io/easyBakeOven/, https://github.com/meerapatelmd/easyBakeOven/
#> 
#> BugReports: https://github.com/meerapatelmd/easyBakeOven/issues/
#> 
#> Imports: glitter,
#> purrr,
#> readr,
#> rlang,
#> secretary,
#> stringr,
#> magrittr
#> 
#> Remotes: meerapatelmd/glitter,
#> meerapatelmd/secretary
#> 
#> Suggests: knitr,
#> rmarkdown
#> 
#> VignetteBuilder: knitr

If “URL” or “BugReports” are not listed as one of the headers in the file, the function will add the “URL” and “BugReports” at the end of the console message in red italics to add to the DESCRIPTION file.

temp_dir <- tempdir()
cat(file = file.path(temp_dir, "DESCRIPTION"))
makeDescription(path = temp_dir, github_user = "meerapatelmd", repo = "easyBakeOven")  
#> NA: NA
#> 
#> : 
#> 
#> URL: https://meerapatelmd.github.io/easyBakeOven/, https://github.com/meerapatelmd/easyBakeOven/URL: https://meerapatelmd.github.io/easyBakeOven/, https://github.com/meerapatelmd/easyBakeOven/
#> BugReports: https://github.com/meerapatelmd/easyBakeOven/issues/BugReports: https://github.com/meerapatelmd/easyBakeOven/issues/
unlink(temp_dir, recursive = TRUE)
